name: Jaguatirica
description:
2018
digital painting
30 x 45 cm

My grandfather used to call my mother "jaguatirica" (ocelot) as a child, because she was small and tough. It means "small and shy jaguar" in tupi-guarani. My mom calls me that too.

I drew this as a celebration of my strong, brave mom, and my sensible grandpa who was an artist and carer of brazilian wild animals back in the 40s.
